articles.author: Paul P. Murphy, Tim Lister and Rob Picheta, CNN
articles.title: Russian vehicles seen inside turbine hall at Ukraine nuclear plant
articles.description: New video has emerged online showing Russian military vehicles inside a turbine hall connected to a nuclear reactor at Ukraine's Zaporizhzhia nuclear power plant, where intensified shelling has fueled fears of a nuclear disaster.

articles.author: Analysis by Stephen Collinson, CNN
articles.title: Analysis: Why the Mar-a-Lago affidavit could become one of the most scrutinized documents in American politics
articles.description: The FBI search of Donald Trump's Florida resort and the removal of classified information raise a compelling need for maximum public disclosure given the involvement of an ex-president who's a likely 2024 candidate.

articles.title: Video: Conway: Trump's lawyers being three-faced about Mar-a-Lago search affidavit - CNN Video
articles.description: George Conway says that Trump's legal team didn't echo former President Donald Trump's public comments about wanting to unseal the Mar-a-Lago search affidavit because they want different outcomes for different reasons.

articles.author: Laura Studley, CNN
articles.title: 'Multiple casualties' reported after two planes collide over California airport, authorities say
articles.description: Authorities confirmed there were "multiple casualties" after two planes crashed mid-air over the Watsonville Municipal Airport Thursday afternoon, city Fire Department Division Chief Rudy Lopez told CNN.

articles.author: Rishi Iyengar, CNN Business
articles.title: You should probably update your Apple devices right now
articles.description: Apple is directing users of most of its devices to update their software after the company discovered a vulnerability in its operating systems that it says "may have been actively exploited."

articles.author: Katelyn Polantz, Evan Perez
articles.title: Unsealed document in Mar-a-Lago search sharpens focus on Trump as possible subject of criminal probe

articles.author: Parija Kavilanz, CNN Business
articles.title: Kohl's is a mess in more ways than one
articles.description: Kohl's can't seem to catch a break, and it may have only itself to blame.

articles.author: Tierney Sneed, Hannah Rabinowitz, Katelyn Polantz and Denise Royal, CNN
articles.title: Takeaways from the court hearing on releasing more documents from the Mar-a-Lago search
articles.description: A US magistrate judge started the process of potentially releasing some information from the affidavit that the Justice Department used to obtain a search warrant for former President Donald Trump's Florida residence.

articles.author: Jamie Gangel, Elizabeth Stuart and Jeremy Herb, CNN

articles.title: Opinion: First Republicans attacked the FBI. Look who they're coming for now
